pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Tuesday, February 22, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

National Capital Region, Canada

Private meetings

The Prime Minister will chair a meeting of the Incident Response Group on the illegal blockades and the situation in Ukraine.

5:00 p.m.  The Prime Minister will deliver remarks and hold a media availability on the situation in Ukraine with Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Finance Chrystia Freeland, Minister of National Defence Anita Anand, and Minister of Foreign Affairs Mélanie Joly.

Room 100
Sir John A. Macdonald Building
144 Wellington Street

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Participation in the question and answer portion of this event is for accredited members of the Parliamentary Press Gallery only. Media who are not members of the Parliamentary Press Gallery may contact pressres2@parl.gc.ca for temporary access.
  • Journalists can dial in to listen and ask questions.
  • Participant dial-in numbers:
    Local: 613-954-9003
    Toll-free: 1-866-206-0153
    Pass code: 4246779#
